description:

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=d18093f860f1 ***

go-tour: correct a link, expand cmplx.Pow hint

Fixes issue 30.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5967062

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

LGTM On Apr 1, 2012 1:37 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://code.google.com/p/go-**tour > > > Description: > go-tour: correct a link, expand cmplx.Pow hint > > Fixes issue 30. > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5967062/ > > Affected files: > M static/index.html > > > Index: static/index.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/static/index.html > +++ b/static/index.html > @@ -1310,7 +1310,8 @@ > >

> Find the cube root of 2, just to make sure the algorithm works. > - There is a cmplx.Pow > function. > + There is a Pow > + function in the math/cmplx package. > >

> package main > @@ -1623,7 +1624,7 @@ > > Note: This example won't run through the web-based tour user > interface. To try writing web servers you may want to > - Install > + Install > Go. > >
> > >

subject: code review 5967062: go-tour: correct a link, expand cmplx.Pow hint
